question: Question
enable_notifications_desc: Allows the user to switch on-/off reminder notifications
use_flashcards_desc: Instead of multiple choice questions, use flashcards
show_explanation_desc: Allows the user to hide validation of answer
enable_sound_desc: Allow to play sound when answering questions
use_custom_remote_desc: Use your own remote source for quiz data (requires Remote Address)
remote_address_desc: Url to json file with quiz data
reader_mode_desc: Enable text-to-speech reading of questions and answers
text_input_mode_desc: Type your answer instead of selecting from choices. Ideal for math quizzes or open-ended questions.
